TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MergeOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how objects being loaded into the object context are merged with objects already in the object context.

span.span: Specifies how objects being loaded into the object context are merged with objects already in the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] 只會維護快取中具有特定實體索引鍵之物件的單一執行個體。The [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] only maintains a single instance of an object with a specific entity key in the cache. 物件是不可變的物件，代表物件的識別。The objects are immutable objects that that represent object's identity. 實體索引鍵是用來執行物件內容中的識別解析。Entity keys are used to perform identity resolution in the object context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用實體索引鍵](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f)。For more information, see [Working with Entity Keys](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f). 如果具有相同的身分識別的實體已在追蹤中，來自資料來源與狀態管理員中的現有資料的資料會根據合併的查詢。If an entity with the same identity is already being tracked, the data coming from the data source and the data already in the state manager are merged according to the of the query.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption AppendOnly = int32(0)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

summary.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are not overwritten with data source values.

span.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are not overwritten with data source values.

summary.span: The state of the object's entry and state of properties of the object in the entry do not change.

span.span: The state of the object's entry and state of properties of the object in the entry do not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption NoTracking = int32(3)

summary.span: Objects are maintained in a state and are not tracked in the .

span.span: Objects are maintained in a state and are not tracked in the .

summary.span: However, [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]-generated entities and POCO entities with proxies maintain a reference to the object context to facilitate loading of related objects.

span.span: However, [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]-generated entities and POCO entities with proxies maintain a reference to the object context to facilitate loading of related objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption OverwriteChanges = int32(1)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

summary.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are overwritten with data source values.

span.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are overwritten with data source values.

summary.span: The state of the object's entry is set to , no properties are marked as modified.

span.span: The state of the object's entry is set to , no properties are marked as modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption PreserveChanges = int32(2)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果實體的狀態為 ，就會使用資料來源值來覆寫項目中的目前和原始值。If the state of the entity is , the current and original values in the entry are overwritten with data source values. 實體的狀態會維持 ，而且沒有屬性會標示為已修改。The state of the entity remains and no properties are marked as modified. 如果實體的狀態為 ，就不會使用資料來源值來覆寫已修改屬性的目前值。If the state of the entity is , the current values of modified properties are not overwritten with data source values. 不過，系統會使用資料來源的值來覆寫未修改屬性的原始值。The original values of unmodified properties are overwritten with the values from the data source. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]第 4 版，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]比較未修改屬性的目前值與資料來源所傳回的值。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version 4, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] compares the current values of unmodified properties with the values that were returned from the data source. 如果這些值不同，屬性就會標示為已修改。If the values are not the same, the property is marked as modified. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 SP1 版中，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] 不會將屬性標示為已修改，即使資料來源中的值不同也一樣。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version 3.5 SP1, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] does not mark the property as modified, even if the value in the data source is different. 當您呼叫 時，只有已修改的屬性會保存到資料來源。Only modified properties are persisted to the data source when you call . 若要保留 3.5 SP1 的行為，請將 設定為 `true`。To preserve the 3.5 SP1 behavior, set to `true`. PreserveChanges 選項可用來解決開放式並行存取例外狀況，同時保存本機內容中的變更。The PreserveChanges option can be used to resolve optimistic concurrency exceptions while preserving changes in the local context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 儲存變更及管理並行存取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e).
